'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is an [ability](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAbilities/) in {{poe2}}.

## Description

{{Description|{{#var:description}}}}

## Effects

{{#var:effects_formatted}}

## Notes

* '''''BENEFIT:''''' Your damaged targets from your Hatchet attacks suffer a penalty of -10 [Accuracy](/accuracy/) for 10 seconds. This affliction seems to only affect weapon attacks from inflicted targets.
* '''''PENALTY:''''' -25% damage from your Hatchet attacks.
